raze_county.desc: Changes the county capital province holding to the designated type. If purge_secondary_holdings = yes, then all secondary province holdings in the county will be destroyed, unless their holding type is excluded with excluded_holding_type = <holding_type>

remove_all_county_modifier_instances.desc: Remove all instances of a modifier from a county

remove_county_modifier.desc: Remove a modifier from a county

remove_important_location.desc: Scoped county is no longer important for anyone

remove_title_from_important_location.desc: Scoped county is no longer important for the target title

reset_title_name.desc: Sets the name and adjective of the scoped title back to being based on its key. Won't cause the prefix to change

reset_title_prefix.desc: Sets the prefix of the scoped title back to being based on its key. Won't cause its adjective or name to change

revoke_lease.desc: Revoke the lease of the scoped title

set_always_follows_primary_heir.desc: Sets if the title should always go to the primary heir in partition succession

set_can_be_named_after_dynasty.desc: Sets if the title can be named after it's holder's dynasty. set_can_be_named_after_dynasty_effect = no

set_can_use_nomadic_naming.desc: Sets if the title can use the dynamic naming for nomads. set_can_use_nomadic_naming = no

set_capital_barony.desc: Sets scoped barony to be the county capital

set_capital_county.desc: Sets the capital county of the title to the target county

set_color_from_title.desc: Sets the color of the title to the same as the target title (shifted very slightly to not be identical)

set_county_culture.desc: sets the culture of a county

set_county_faith.desc: Changes what faith a county has

set_de_jure_liege_title.desc: Set a new DeJure liege title

set_definitive_form.desc: Sets if the title should use a definitive form name (no 'Kingdom of')

set_delete_on_destroy.desc: Sets if the title should be deleted from the gamestate completely when it is destroyed. set_delete_on_destroy = yes

set_destroy_if_invalid_heir.desc: Sets if the title should be destroyed on succession if there's no heir matching its restrictions. set_destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes

set_destroy_on_gain_same_tier.desc: Sets if the title should be deleted from the gamestate completely when character gains or create a new title with the same tier.set_destroy_on_gain_same_tier = yes

set_destroy_on_succession.desc: Sets if the title should be destroyed on succession. set_destroy_on_succession = yes

set_important_location.desc: Scoped county is set as important for the target title
set_important_location.usage:
scope:county = {
set_important_location = {
title = scope:higher_tier_title
enter_realm_event = event_name
enter_realm_on_action = onaction_name
leave_realm_event = event_name
leave_realm_on_action = onaction_name

set_landless_title.desc: Sets if the title is landless (can be held by rulers with no land)

set_no_automatic_claims.desc: Sets if the title should disallow automatic claims (meaning claims will only be added by script, and by pressed claims being inherited).

set_noble_family_title.desc: Change if the scoped title is for a noble family, allowing landless playable. Title must be at least a duchy

set_state_faith.desc: Set the State Faith of a Title whose holder has the state_faith government rule

set_title_name.desc: sets the name (localization key) of the scoped title. The adjective will be constructed by adding '_adj' to the localisation key. Won't cause the prefix to change

set_title_prefix.desc: sets the prefix of the scoped title. Won't cause its name or adjective to change

title_create_faction.desc: the scoped landed title creates a faction of the specified type against the specified target, title_create_faction = { type = X target = Y }

title_join_faction.desc: the landed title in the scope joins the assigned faction

title_leave_faction.desc: the title in the scope leaves the assigned faction

transfer_owned_maa_control.desc: Transfers control of the scoped title's owned MaA to the target title

transfer_title_maa_ownership.desc: Transfers ownership of the scoped title's owned MaA to the target title

update_dynamic_coa.notes: Updates the dynamic coat of arms definition of a given title picking a new one and overwriting the existing set coat of arms with it if picked

add_faction_discontent.desc: add_faction_discontent = X adds (or subtracts) discontent to the scope faction

every_faction_county_member.desc: Iterate through all faction county members

every_faction_member.desc: Iterate through all faction character members

faction_remove_war.desc: Removes the war currently associated with the faction

faction_start_war.desc: The scope faction starts the war agains their target.

ordered_faction_county_member.desc: Iterate through all faction county members

ordered_faction_member.desc: Iterate through all faction character members

random_faction_county_member.desc: Iterate through all faction county members

random_faction_member.desc: Iterate through all faction character members

remove_special_character.desc: Removes the special character for the scope faction

remove_special_title.desc: Removes the special character for the scope faction

set_special_character.desc: Sets the special character for the scope faction

set_special_title.desc: Sets the special title for the scope faction

battle_event.desc: Makes a battle event show up in combat, and the combat result summary. The key is used for loc, with '_friendly' or '_enemy' appended. If this side is not the player's side, the two portraits get flipped. battle_event = { left_portrait = someone right_portrait = someone key = string }

every_side_commander.desc: Iterate through all commanders (the commanders of every army on the side, not just the one leading the battle)

every_side_participant.desc: Returns all participants in a combat side

force_win.desc: Make the this side of the combat win the combat (or lose if 'force_win = no'), regardless of number of soldiers left. Happens instantly.

ordered_side_commander.desc: Iterate through all commanders (the commanders of every army on the side, not just the one leading the battle)

ordered_side_participant.desc: Returns all participants in a combat side

random_side_commander.desc: Iterate through all commanders (the commanders of every army on the side, not just the one leading the battle)

random_side_participant.desc: Returns all participants in a combat side

set_allow_early_retreat.desc: Allow early retreat for one side of the combat. This means if this side loses, it can retreat even if the battle was short. (before NCombat::MIN_DAYS_BEFORE_MANUAL_RETREAT)
set_allow_early_retreat.usage:
set_allow_early_retreat = yes
You can undo this via 'set_allow_early_retreat = no' (which is the default)

set_disallowed_retreat.desc: Disallow retreat for one side of the combat. This means if this side loses, they will take hard casualties.
set_disallowed_retreat.usage:
set_disallowed_retreat = yes
You can undo this via 'set_disallowed_retreat = no' (which is the default)

set_skip_pursuit.desc: Skip pursuit phase for this combat side, if they would lose. This means that they will not take more casualties from pursuit.
set_skip_pursuit.usage:
set_skip_pursuit = yes
You can undo this via 'set_skip_pursuit = no' (which is the default)

set_winner.desc: Make the a side of a combat become the winner, regardless of number of soldiers left.
set_winner.usage:
set_winner = yes
You can undo this win (this tick) via 'set_winner = no'
set_winner.notes: The combat will progress to the pursuit phase the next tick.

add_domicile_building.desc: Add building to scoped domicile, ignores cost and construction time

change_herd.desc: Adds/removes herd to/from a scoped domicile

change_provisions.desc: Adds (or removes) provisions to a scoped domicile

construct_domicile_building.desc: Construct building to scoped domicile, ignores cost but uses construction time

lower_domicile_building.desc: Downgrade building to previous from scoped domicile or destroy it if at lowest

lower_domicile_building_no_refund.desc: Downgrade building to previous from scoped domicile or destroy it if at lowest, without refunding

remove_domicile_building_no_refund.desc: Remove building from scoped domicile without refunding it

set_domicile_culture.desc: Sets the domicile's culture, if it supports it

set_domicile_faith.desc: Sets the domicile's faith, if it supports it

change_inspiration_progress.notes: Changes the progress of the scoped inspiration

invest_gold.notes: Invests gold into the scoped inspiration from its sponsor, it handles the removal of the gold from the sponsor, must be a positive value
